# Vanish (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Component:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level (up to 5 rounds) (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 253

This spell functions like *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]],* except the effect only lasts for 1 round per caster level (maximum of 5 rounds). Like *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]*, the spell immediately ends if the subject attacks any creature.
